description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Updated to the Eclipse 2025-12 framework.
- New: Added a search filter to the Security Performance view.
- New: Added an option to group trades by taxonomy in the Trades view.
- New: Added an option for a flat view (disable taxonomy grouping) in the Statement of Assets.
- New: Added Ford Money, Debitum Investments, and Schelhammer Capital Bank AG PDF importers.
- New: Added average columns to the Payments view showing monthly, quarterly, or yearly averages.
- Improvement: The input dialog now presets the transaction date from the last entry.
- Improvement: CSV import now calculates the exchange rate if not provided for forex gross values.
- Improvement: Added a CSV import template for Targobank bank account transactions.
- Improvement: Added an experimental option to enable monitor-specific scaling.
- Improvement: Extended Interactive Brokers Flex Query (IBFlex) exchange support and improved currency conversion handling.
- Improvement: Enhanced PDF importers for Suresse Direkt Bank, Schelhammer Capital, Baader Bank, Saxo Bank, comdirect, Deutsche Bank, Consorsbank, Scalable Capital, DKB, easybank, Trade Republic, flatex, DADAT Bank, Deutsche Postbank, Bourse Direct, Tradegate AG, Hypothekarbank Lenzburg, Yuh, and PostFinance.
- Fix: Fixed dividend rate of return calculations when currencies differ.
- Fix: Fixed unescaped tooltip labels.
